ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: It is We who determine. What an excellent Determiner!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then We facilitated (your birth). How well do We calculate!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: See that We had the power to do so. Great indeed is Our power to do what We will.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus did We Plan and how excellent is Our planning!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We then calculated; so how excellently do We control!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So We did measure; and We are the best to measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We proportion it-- how well are We at proportioning (things).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We determined; excellent determiners are We.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus We arranged. How excellent is Our arranging!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Thus We have determined the stages of development and Our power to determine is excellent indeed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So We decreed. How excellent are We as decreers!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We determined; and how excellent determiners We are!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For We do determine (according to need); for We are the best to determine (things).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So We did measure, and We are the Best to measure (the things).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We determined, how excellent a Determiner are We!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We measured precisely. We are the best to measure.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We determined [it], and excellent [are We] to determine.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:23]   Thus We were able, to do this; so [how] excellent able ones We are!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus We arranged) its creation; it is also said this means: We controlled its creation; it is also said this means: and We fashioned its creation in the woman's womb. (How excellent is Our arranging!) how excellent is what We created and fashioned! 719
